front.title: Definitions of Managed Objects for the Fourth Version of Border Gateway Protocol (BGP-4)- Extensions for Optional parameters

abstract.t: This memo is an extention to the BGP-4 MIB to support the Optional Parameters attributes for Authentication [RFC1771 4.2a] and BGP-4 Capabilities Advertisement [RFC2842]. Additionally, this MIB provides a registration point for BGP-4 Capabilities defined protocols.
